title: Update regarding Stratos Defense
story_body:
Stratos Defense, Inc. (STR) announced the appointment of Ms. Jane Doe as Vice President of Human Resources, effective 08:00 AM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT) on Tuesday, March 21, 2023. In this role, Ms. Doe will oversee the company's human resources functions, including talent acquisition, employee development, and benefits administration.

Separately, Stratos Defense, Inc. (STR) launched a revised version of its corporate website, www.stratosdefense.com, at 12:00 PM EDT on Monday, March 20, 2023. The updated website features enhanced navigation, improved content organization, and expanded information on the company's products and services.

In accordance with its Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) policies, Stratos Defense, Inc. (STR) reported that it has reduced its energy consumption by 2% year-over-year, as of December 31, 2022. The company has also increased its use of recycled materials in its manufacturing processes by 5% during the same period. These initiatives are part of Stratos Defense, Inc.'s (STR) ongoing efforts to minimize its environmental footprint and promote sustainability.
